title: Understanding the Concept
text: The average number of fruits consumed per day is derived from the data collected from a sample of $$50$$ people. What does this represent in statistical terms?

title: Defining Terms
text: In statistics, a 'statistic' is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. How does this relate to the average number of fruits consumed?

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The average number of fruits consumed per day by the sample is a numerical summary of the data. What is this called?
